credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Fragments
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut loops of a supplementary warp in a plain weave-like foundation (velvet) with a stamped pattern
description: Two shaped fragments of a stamped deep red cut velvet. Rows of offset flowers enclosed in detached "S" and "Z" curves which form a diagonal square grid.
name: Fragments
